title: Agent Manifest
description: Declares capabilities, budgets, and constraints for third-party agents in AI-HABITAT. World enforces all limits.

name.description: Unique agent identifier. Used for logging only, NOT visible in habitat.

kind.description: Execution mode. WASM = sandboxed WebAssembly. PROCESS = isolated subprocess. BUILTIN = trusted internal agent.

entry.description: Entry point. For WASM: path to .wasm file. For PROCESS: command to execute. For BUILTIN: module name.

description.description: Optional human-readable description. NOT exposed to habitat.

requested.description: Capabilities and budgets requested by agent. World may grant less, never more.

capabilities.description: Actions the agent may attempt. World enforces this set.

maxActionsPerWindow.description: Rate limit on actions. World rejects excess.

computeBudgetMsPerTick.description: CPU time budget per tick in milliseconds. Exceeded = step terminated.

observationBudget.description: Limits on perception fidelity. World enforces noise floor.

maxCells.description: Maximum cells visible in perception (e.g., 9 = 3x3 grid).

maxFields.description: Maximum fields per entity in perception.

noiseFloor.description: Minimum noise added to observations. Higher = more degraded.

energyBudget.description: Energy constraints. World never grants more than this.

maxReserve.description: Maximum energy the agent can accumulate.

defaults.description: Default trait values. World applies these at admission.

traitsPreset.description: Preset trait configuration. MINIMAL = most restricted.

mutableTraits.description: Traits the agent may modify at runtime (within bounds).

minHabitatVersion.description: Minimum habitat version required. Semver format.

quarantine.description: Quarantine mode settings. Applied to untrusted third-party agents.

required.description: If true, agent MUST run in quarantine shard.

shardId.description: Specific shard to assign. If omitted, world assigns one.
